verbs.description: [V: Are] [ARG1: Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] [ARG2: serious about denuclearization] or will they play the same games as their predecessors ?
Are Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un serious about denuclearization or [V: will] they play the same games as their predecessors ?
Are Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un serious about denuclearization or [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARG0: they] [V: play] [ARG1: the same games as their predecessors] ?
